name: Galactic Traders
description:
Fight with other players to control the trade routes and become the ultimate trader.

Controls (Game requires controllers and 2-4 players)

Start - Enter game (if the game is screen is blank, thats because no one has entered yet)

Joystick - Move

A - Fire Laser

B - Fire Missile

Y - Disconnect from planet

DPad - Buy Upgrades

Mechanics

Move near a planet to form a teather, then fly to another planet to form a trade route.

Shoot down other players trade ships to eliminate their trade routes.

Buy upgrade to get a leg up on the competition.

Reach $3,000 first to win the game.

Asset Credits

  • Universal Sound FX by Imphenzia
  • Ultimate Game Music Collection by John Leonard French
  • Pixel Art Spaceships For Shmup by Dylestorm
